translated: This means where there is the flesh of a mongoose.🔽Again means that these also enter the water, enter the fire, gaze at the sun, gaze at the moon, worship the cliff, and ride on stakes and so on.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang de bzhin du chur 'jug pa dang / mer 'jug pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / zla ba la lta ba dang / g-yang la mchod pa dang / gsal shing la sogs pa la zhon pa 'di dag don dang bcas pa yin nam snyam pa la gal te tshul khrims kyis rgud la don med ces gsungs te 'bad pa 'bras bu med ces bya bar snyegs so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang de bzhin du chur 'jug pa dang / mer 'jug pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / zla ba la lta ba dang / g-yang la mchod pa dang / gsal shing la sogs pa la zhon pa 'di dag don dang bcas pa yin nam snyam pa la gal te tshul khrims kyis rgud la don med ces gsungs te 'bad pa 'bras bu med ces bya bar snyegs so //
translated: If one thinks these are meaningful, it is said that they are meaningless due to the decline of ethics, meaning that effort is fruitless.

original: des na bag chags ngan pa la bdag phyin ci log gi dbang gis lam gol bar 'jug cing bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' la yang yid mi ches shing lam drang po la 'gror mi btub pa'i snying rje'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: des na bag chags ngan pa la bdag phyin ci log gi dbang gis lam gol bar 'jug cing bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' la yang yid mi ches shing lam drang po la 'gror mi btub pa'i snying rje'i gnas yin no //
translated: Therefore, due to the power of their negative tendencies, they enter the wrong path and do not have confidence in the words of the Sugata. They are the objects of compassion, unable to proceed on the straight path.

original: de bas na tshul khrims kyi nor 'di ni gru dang 'dra ba la 'phags pa'i nor gang gi nor las mchog yin la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang na yang gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: de bas na tshul khrims kyi nor 'di ni gru dang 'dra ba la 'phags pa'i nor gang gi nor las mchog yin la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang na yang gtso bo yin te /
translated: Therefore, this wealth of morality is like a boat. It is the best of all the wealth of the āryas and is the most important of the six perfections.

original: rin po che 'di gsum gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags so snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: rin po che 'di gsum gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags so snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: One should think that these three jewels are praised by the buddhas.

original: de ltar tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa bsgrubs zin nas /
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa bsgrubs zin nas /
translated: Having thus accomplished the especially exalted morality,🔽now, in order to teach the qualities of that morality by way of example,

original: da ni 'di'i yon tan ston pa de nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'di'i yon tan ston pa de nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: it was said:

original: ji ltar tshul khrims bla med ldan pa'i dri //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar tshul khrims bla med ldan pa'i dri // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “Just as the scent of white sandalwood🔽is a fragrance that pervades everywhere,🔽so too the morality of the bodhisattvas🔽is a fragrance that pervades everywhere.”

original: ji ltar zhes pa ni dri ba bkod pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes pa ni dri ba bkod pa ste /
translated: “Just as” sets up a question.

original: de ltar zhes 'og ma dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: de ltar zhes 'og ma dang 'brel lo //
translated: Thus is connected with what follows.

original: tshul khrims de bslab pa yin pa'i @171b phyir ro ;
analyzed: tshul khrims de bslab pa yin pa'i @171b phyir ro ;
translated: Because that morality is training.🔽The fragrance that is associated with the unsurpassed is the fragrance that is associated with it or abides in it.

original: / bla med ldan pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa de ldan pa'am de la gnas pa'i dri ni de'i dri ste rjed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / bla med ldan pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni gong na med pa de ldan pa'am de la gnas pa'i dri ni de'i dri ste rjed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The fragrance of morality is unsurpassed.

original: dam pa mtho ris 'di na mi zad ldan //
analyzed: dam pa mtho ris 'di na mi zad ldan //
translated: The best, heaven, is associated with the inexhaustible.

original: zhes bya ba la dam pa ni mchog yin la mtho ris ni gnas bcu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dam pa ni mchog yin la mtho ris ni gnas bcu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The best is supreme. Heaven is the ten stages, etc.

original: de nyid la bde 'gro zhes kyang bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid la bde 'gro zhes kyang bya ste /
translated: That is also called good destiny.

original: de'i gnas sam rten 'di ni tshul khrims kyi dri mi zad pa ste /
analyzed: de'i gnas sam rten 'di ni tshul khrims kyi dri mi zad pa ste /
translated: The abode or basis of that is the inexhaustible fragrance of morality.

original: drag cing mu med par smin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽de ltar phreng pa'i dri ni khyab min zhing //
analyzed: drag cing mu med par smin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de ltar phreng pa'i dri ni khyab min zhing //
translated: It is said to be strong and ripening without limit.🔽The fragrance of a garland is not like that.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngom brtson gyi dri de ltar me tog phred ba la sogs pa'i dris ni khyab mi nus te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngom brtson gyi dri de ltar me tog phred ba la sogs pa'i dris ni khyab mi nus te /
translated: The fragrance of one who is diligent is not like the fragrance of a garland, etc.

original: dman zhing mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dman zhing mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not able to pervade because it is inferior and weak.🔽The fragrance of morality pervades everywhere.🔽The fragrance of morality pervades everywhere.

original: 'o na sman sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba'i byug pa dag gis nus sam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na sman sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba'i byug pa dag gis nus sam zhe na /
translated: But can't the smell of various ointments be spread?

original: de bzhin byug pa'i dri yang khyab mi 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin byug pa'i dri yang khyab mi 'gyur // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The smell of ointments is not spread in the same way.🔽The smell of ointments and wish-granting trees, etc.🔽cannot be spread in the same way that morality is spread.

original: tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo skye ba du mar mtho ris kyi skas la rgyu ba bzhin du /🔽byug pa dang dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i dris ni ga la nus zhes bya ba'i don yin no ;
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo skye ba du mar mtho ris kyi skas la rgyu ba bzhin du / byug pa dang dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i dris ni ga la nus zhes bya ba'i don yin no ;
translated: Morality is like a staircase to heaven, which is ascended in many lives.

original: / de ltar yon tan bstan nas de'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: / de ltar yon tan bstan nas de'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis /
translated: Having thus taught the virtues of morality, to teach its results, the Master said:

original: 'di na bdag dga' gzhan du 'gro ba bde //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽'di na zhes bya ba ni sngom brtson gyi gzhi 'di na'o //
analyzed: 'di na bdag dga' gzhan du 'gro ba bde // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / 'di na zhes bya ba ni sngom brtson gyi gzhi 'di na'o //
translated: Here, one is happy; elsewhere, one goes in bliss.🔽Here means in this life.🔽One is happy means one is happy in this life.

original: bdag dga' zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste /🔽gang zag la la dag go //
analyzed: bdag dga' zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste / gang zag la la dag go //
translated: This is an illustration.🔽Some people are happy in this life.

original: gzhan du 'gro ba bde zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhan du ste /
analyzed: gzhan du 'gro ba bde zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhan du ste /
translated: Elsewhere means in other lives.

original: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs par 'gro ba na sems bde bar 'gro ba ste de nyid rgyas par mdo dag las blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs par 'gro ba na sems bde bar 'gro ba ste de nyid rgyas par mdo dag las blta bar bya'o //
translated: When one goes to another world and so on, one goes with a happy mind.

original: grags dang dga' nyid kun gyis bkur ba ste //
analyzed: grags dang dga' nyid kun gyis bkur ba ste //
translated: One is famous, delightful, and respected by all.

original: zhes bya ba la grags pa de ni 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la grags pa de ni 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
translated: One is famous in the world.

original: dga' ba ni bdag nyid dga' ba ste /
analyzed: dga' ba ni bdag nyid dga' ba ste /
translated: One is delightful because one is happy.

original: tshul khrims kyi dbang gis ni snyid por mthong zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi dbang gis ni snyid por mthong zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: By means of morality, one is seen as a treasure.

original: chos ldan zhes bya ba ni khrims ldan can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos ldan zhes bya ba ni khrims ldan can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One is righteous because one is moral.

original: kun gyis bkur ba ste zhes bya ba ni gang zag de la sems can mang po dag gis bkur zhing rim gro byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun gyis bkur ba ste zhes bya ba ni gang zag de la sems can mang po dag gis bkur zhing rim gro byed pa'o //
translated: One is respected by all, because many beings respect and honor that person.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas think of one.

original: de skad du slob dpon tsandra go mis /
analyzed: de skad du slob dpon tsandra go mis /
translated: As Candragomin says:

original: de tshe de la dge ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de tshe de la dge ba'i phyir //
translated: Then, because of that goodness,

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
translated: the Victors and their Sons🔽think of you with love.

original: dge ba'i thugs kyis rtag par yang //
analyzed: dge ba'i thugs kyis rtag par yang //
translated: And with a virtuous mind, they will always

original: bu sdug 'dra bar dgongs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bu sdug 'dra bar dgongs par 'gyur //
translated: Think of you as a beloved child.

original: zhes gsungs @172a pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs @172a pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: de tsam du zad dam zhe na /
analyzed: de tsam du zad dam zhe na /
translated: Is that all?

original: chos ldan 'bras bu de de mang por mthong //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: chos ldan 'bras bu de de mang por mthong // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The results of being righteous are seen to be many.

original: chos ldan zhes bya ba ni khrims ldan no //
analyzed: chos ldan zhes bya ba ni khrims ldan no //
translated: Here, “righteous” means “moral.”

original: 'bras bu ni 'bras bu ste 'dod pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni 'bras bu ste 'dod pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Results” are the results of the results, because they are the desired goals.

original: de de mang por mthong zhes bya ba ni de dang de dag ste /
analyzed: de de mang por mthong zhes bya ba ni de dang de dag ste /
translated: “They are seen to be many” means that they are seen to be this and that.

original: gzhan dpag tu med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan dpag tu med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are seen to be immeasurable.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽tshul khrims 'bras bu drang srong chen pos gsungs //🔽zhes bya ba ston te de'i 'bras bu ni lhag par yang drang srong chen pos gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / tshul khrims 'bras bu drang srong chen pos gsungs // zhes bya ba ston te de'i 'bras bu ni lhag par yang drang srong chen pos gsungs te /
translated: How is that?🔽The results of morality are taught by the Great Sage.🔽The results of that are taught by the Great Sage.

original: de ni che ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni che ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that they are taught by the Great Sage because they are great.

original: de nas de nyid rgyas par ni sdang ba dor zhing gus pa skyes pas bstan bcos dang mdo sde la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de nyid rgyas par ni sdang ba dor zhing gus pa skyes pas bstan bcos dang mdo sde la blta bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in order to expand on that, one should look at the treatises and the sūtras with devotion, having cast aside hostility.🔽Now, in order to teach that very result by way of six types of antidotes or examples,

original: da ni 'bras bu de nyid gnyen po 'am dpe rnam pa drug gi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /🔽tshul khrims nad la sman pa'i mchog yin zhing /
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu de nyid gnyen po 'am dpe rnam pa drug gi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir / tshul khrims nad la sman pa'i mchog yin zhing /
translated: it is said:

original: zhes bya smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya smos te /
translated: “Morality is the supreme medicine for the illness of suffering.”

original: dper na shin tu yun rings nad kyis gdungs pa de dag la sman pa mkhas pa dag gis nad kyi rgyu las phye nas sman bzang po dag gis sbyor ba bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na shin tu yun rings nad kyis gdungs pa de dag la sman pa mkhas pa dag gis nad kyi rgyu las phye nas sman bzang po dag gis sbyor ba bzhin du /
translated: For example, for those who are afflicted by illness for a very long time, the wise physicians, having analyzed the cause of the illness, apply good medicine.

original: ngan 'gro sdug bsngal nad dang 'dra ba du ma dag gis gzir ba de dag la tshul khrims ni sman pa'i mchog yin te /
analyzed: ngan 'gro sdug bsngal nad dang 'dra ba du ma dag gis gzir ba de dag la tshul khrims ni sman pa'i mchog yin te /
translated: In the same way, for those who are afflicted by the many illnesses of the suffering of the bad migrations, morality is the supreme medicine,

original: nad de dag las thar par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nad de dag las thar par byed pa'o //
translated: because it liberates from those illnesses.

original: mun pa'i sgron ma nyam thag la skyabs dang // zhes bya ba la gzhan yang mun pa'i tshogs shin tu chen po dag la mar me la sogs pa chung ngu dag gis de dag thams cad sel ba de bzhin du ma rig pa'i mun pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dag la tshul khrims kyis dngos sam brgyud
analyzed: mun pa'i sgron ma nyam thag la skyabs dang // zhes bya ba la gzhan yang mun pa'i tshogs shin tu chen po dag la mar me la sogs pa chung ngu dag gis de dag thams cad sel ba de bzhin du ma rig pa'i mun pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dag la tshul khrims kyis dngos sam brgyud
translated: The lamp of darkness is a refuge for the wretched.🔽🔽Moreover, just as a small lamp dispels a great mass of darkness, so too, through ethics, directly or indirectly, one dispels the immeasurable darkness of ignorance.

original: pa'i sgo nas sgron ma'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: pa'i sgo nas sgron ma'i mchog yin no //
translated: The lamp for the blind, the refuge for the wretched.🔽Moreover, just as a small lamp dispels a great mass of darkness, so too morality is the supreme lamp for the immeasurable darkness of ignorance.

original: de bzhin di sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyam thag pa de dag la tshul khrims ni skyabs kyi mchog yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: de bzhin di sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyam thag pa de dag la tshul khrims ni skyabs kyi mchog yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: It is the supreme refuge for those wretched with various sufferings.

original: 'jigs la bsrung dang phongs la nye du dang // zhes bya ba mi dang mi ma yin pas 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i mchog yin zhing phongs shing rgud pa nye du la sogs pa lta bu ste /🔽tshul khrims zhes sbyar ro /
analyzed: 'jigs la bsrung dang phongs la nye du dang // zhes bya ba mi dang mi ma yin pas 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i mchog yin zhing phongs shing rgud pa nye du la sogs pa lta bu ste / tshul khrims zhes sbyar ro /
translated: It is the supreme protection for those frightened by humans and non-humans, and it is like relatives for the poor and destitute.

original: 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med gzigs gyur yin //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med gzigs gyur yin //
translated: It is the supreme boat for those who wish to cross the ocean of samsara.🔽It is the supreme medicine for those afflicted by the disease of the afflictions.🔽It is the supreme friend for those who wish to enjoy the pleasures of gods and humans.🔽It is the supreme guide for those who wish to enter the city of nirvana.🔽It is the supreme light for those who wish to see the path of liberation.🔽It is the supreme friend for those who wish to cross the ocean of samsara.🔽It is the supreme medicine for those afflicted by the disease of the afflictions.🔽It is the supreme friend for those who wish to enjoy the pleasures of gods and humans.🔽It is the supreme guide for those who wish to enter the city of nirvana.🔽It is the supreme light for those who wish to see the path of liberation.

original: zhes bya ba ni dper na rgya mtsho las 'gro ba na gzings la brten nas 'gro ba bzhin du tshul khrims ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po la gzings dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dper na rgya mtsho las 'gro ba na gzings la brten nas 'gro ba bzhin du tshul khrims ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po la gzings dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Just as one travels on the great ocean by relying on a ship, so too, morality is like a ship on the great ocean of cyclic existence.

original: de dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa mdo las bshad de /
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa mdo las bshad de /
translated: The benefits of morality are explained in the sutras as immeasurable.

original: tshul khrims @172b yang dag pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: tshul khrims @172b yang dag pa'i mdo las /
translated: The Sutra of Perfect Morality states:

original: de phyir ston pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad //
analyzed: de phyir ston pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad //
translated: Therefore, the Teacher praised morality and explained it.

original: tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad //
analyzed: tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad //
translated: Those with morality meet with the appearance of a buddha.

original: tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kyin gyi mchog / tshul khrims ldan pa dri dang byug pa yin //
analyzed: tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kyin gyi mchog / tshul khrims ldan pa dri dang byug pa yin //
translated: Those with morality are the supreme ornament, the supreme fragrance, and the supreme perfume.

original: zhes 'byung ste rgyas par ni mdo nyid la bta'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ste rgyas par ni mdo nyid la bta'o //
translated: This is explained extensively in the sutra itself.

original: de ltar tshul khrims rnam par dag pas sems la 'gyod pa med /
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims rnam par dag pas sems la 'gyod pa med /
translated: Thus, since morality is pure, the mind is without regret.

original: sems la 'gyod pa med pa sems dben zhing ting nge 'dzin las su rung ste /
analyzed: sems la 'gyod pa med pa sems dben zhing ting nge 'dzin las su rung ste /
translated: Since the mind is without regret, the mind is isolated and serviceable for concentration.

original: de bas na rin po che dang 'dra ba 'di ni lam gyi mchog yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rin po che dang 'dra ba 'di ni lam gyi mchog yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is like a jewel, the best of paths.

original: de ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas gang zag gi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas gang zag gi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the distinction of persons from the point of view of the result, he says:

original: gang zhig 'dul ba'i tshul khrims rnam 'jig tshe //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dul ba'i tshul khrims rnam 'jig tshe //
translated: When the morality of the Vinaya is destroyed,

original: skrag zhugs tshul khrims ldan pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: skrag zhugs tshul khrims ldan pa yod ma yin //
translated: there is no one who has morality, who has entered into fear.

original: zhes bya ba smos te gang zhig ces bya ni gang zag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te gang zhig ces bya ni gang zag go //
translated: The one who is called someone is a person.

original: 'dul ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba las gsungs pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba las gsungs pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: The morality of the Vinaya is the morality taught in the Vinaya.

original: rnam 'jig tshe zhes pa ni btang ba'i tshe ste med par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam 'jig tshe zhes pa ni btang ba'i tshe ste med par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: When it is destroyed means when it is given up, when it is no longer.

original: skrag zhugs zhes bya ba ni de'i dbang gis te 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: skrag zhugs zhes bya ba ni de'i dbang gis te 'jigs pa'o //
translated: Who has entered into fear means who has entered into the power of that, who is afraid.

original: tshul khrims ldan pa zhes pa ma nyams pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims ldan pa zhes pa ma nyams pa ste /
translated: Who has morality means who has not lost it.

original: gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has it is called that.

original: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa'am bag khums pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: yod ma yin zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa'am bag khums pa med pa yin te /
translated: There is no one means there is no one who is afraid or timid.

original: tshul khrims de'i dbang gis bdag nyid dga' bar bshad na 'jigs pa lta ga la srid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshul khrims de'i dbang gis bdag nyid dga' bar bshad na 'jigs pa lta ga la srid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: If one is happy by the power of that morality, how much more so when one is fearless.

original: de ltar 'bras bu bshad zin nad de nyid bsrung bar gdams par 'dod nas //
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu bshad zin nad de nyid bsrung bar gdams par 'dod nas //
translated: Thus, having explained the result, he wishes to advise the protection of that very morality,

original: de bas 'jig rten gzhan mtha' rgal sems skyis /
analyzed: de bas 'jig rten gzhan mtha' rgal sems skyis /
translated: therefore, one should generate the thought of crossing to the other shore of the world.

original: 'gang zhig bgrod 'dod des ni tshul khrims bsrung //
analyzed: 'gang zhig bgrod 'dod des ni tshul khrims bsrung //
translated: One who wishes to go should protect morality.

original: zhes smos te de bas zhes bya ba ni de bas na'o //
analyzed: zhes smos te de bas zhes bya ba ni de bas na'o //
translated: Therefore means because of that.

original: 'jig rten gzhan mtha' zhes bya ba mtha' gzhan te /

analyzed: rab kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas gdams pa ni /

original: shes rab zhi zhes bya ba smos te /

translated: As Master Śāntideva says:

original: 'di dag legs par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag legs par bshad pa yin no //

translated: Now, in order to show that all of these depend on morality, he concludes:🔽Therefore, those who wish to attain

analyzed: lo brgya brtse ba can gyi gtam la rnam bshad pas //
